name: Arcade Space Shooter (Alejandro Terriza)
description:
In Nov 2019 I decided to make this game, in order to learn how the original game was done. I learned and enjoyed a lot making this!

I also created a VR visor to, in the future, export the game to Android and use it in there.

CONTROLS

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to shoot
  • Menu button to enable/disable VR mode (recommended for mobile devices only)

Here is some gameplay
